about_the_game:
GAME OVERVIEW :

You are a Sheriff on a planet somewhere in the galaxy, leads by a mining corporation. One day the main city is under attack. What is happening? by who and why, is what you have to discover. Your first mission is to protect the city and the citizen. In your adventure you will meet different allies to help you and will investigate to find the truth.

The adventure will take place in an open environement with a strong narrative focus in an immersive and atmospheric world. It is an Isometric shooter game in Voxel graphic type. You will follow the main quest and side quests to discover what is happening in the city. Find powerfull hidden weapons through the city to beat your enemies with your special spaceboots gear. The spaceboots gives you the ability to move faster when you are in attack mode and dash as well. You will have 2 weapons switchable at any time and you will be able to find more different weapons with their own statistics, but this is NOT an rpg game, weapons cannot be upgradable, this is just a simple shooter game with his own story line, more focus on the story and immersion.

When killing an enemy he will drop different loots, like medkit, armor, dash regen... you can at any time if you are in a bad position cover yourself behind walls (use your environement).

The game wants to be dynamic with a simple gameplay and leave the player explore this futuristic city somewhere in the universe. This is a Solo game with different enemy type and strongness, as well you will be able to follow the story dialogs at your own rhythm.

Enjoy the Powerfull shotgun...

An immersive and atmospheric world...

By CrunchBoy
